name: Linux
description: My favorite Make Me Buy video, he brilliantly displays what Linux has to offer!

name: Fitness Horizon Scale
description: Moutasm can sell anything, even this scale!

name: Yakuza
description: After watching this video, I nearly wanted to go back to playing games!

name: Why FCIT
description: Zeyad initially had no idea on what to do for his Make Me Buy video! He believed that there was nothing interesting about him! After talking some sense into him, he realized what he needed to do, and created this masterpiece!

name: Plasmophobia Review
description: Ebra used to have his own Gaming Channel! From his video, it is obvious he has experience in delivering game reviews, which he has applied perfectly for this task.

name: RYZEN 3200G Review
description: Khaled created his own intro based on Linus Tech Tips', and finished the video mere days after the task was released!

name: Visiting Other Worlds
description: I believe this video is cheating, as it uses Interstellar's emotional music against us!

name: Travelling to Japan
description: Ahmed shows us some interesting attractions in Japan!

name: HyperX Cloud
description: I had been struggling with my video audio for months, and Faisel's video was the first person to convince me to buy actual headphones!

name: Harvard's CS50
description: My own Make Me Buy Video, I wanted to guide the students into developing their Programming Skills, through this amazing course that I took when I personally started programming.
